analysis.description:
Coin786token18.startDate (/unique_chucks/37/0x5d2bc5ea02ff6efb44a3b67a4c6b42fbc26d9965.sol#107) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- fallback (/unique_chucks/37/0x5d2bc5ea02ff6efb44a3b67a4c6b42fbc26d9965.sol#214-226)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/37/0x5d2bc5ea02ff6efb44a3b67a4c6b42fbc26d9965.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/37/0x5d2bc5ea02ff6efb44a3b67a4c6b42fbc26d9965.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/37/0x5d2bc5ea02ff6efb44a3b67a4c6b42fbc26d9965.sol#85) is not in mixedCase
